nhc_headline: ...BERYL TAKING AIM AT THE WINDWARD ISLANDS... ...LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE EXPECTED TO BEGIN THIS MORNING...
summary:
...BERYL TAKING AIM AT THE WINDWARD ISLANDS... ...LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE EXPECTED TO BEGIN THIS MORNING...
 As of 5:00 AM AST Mon Jul 1
 the center of Beryl was located near 11.7, -59.9
 with movement W at 20 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 965 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 120 mph.
